thread.title: ParFX adds renminbi to traded currencies
thread.title_full: ParFX adds renminbi to traded currencies

author: Financial News
title: ParFX adds renminbi to traded currencies
text:
ParFX adds renminbi to traded currencies By Anna Irrera and James Rundle 23 September 2015 Electronic foreign exchange platform ParFX has added offshore renminbi-dollar to its FX pairs, as the Chinese currency continues to gain acceptance in the global financial system.
